name: Chateau de Montcaud

reviews.title: Have a Pastis While You Wait for Dinner
reviews.text: This chateau has been lovingly restored. The rooms are luxurious and spacious. The grounds are beautiful and the pool is inviting after a long day of touring neighboring towns, villages, and wineries. The food and wine are fabulous. Rudy is an impeccable host.

reviews.title: Outstanding Country Home
reviews.text: A marvelous country house set on 11 wooded acres about 35 km from Avignon. The hotelier, Rudy Baur and his wife are two of the most accommodating and warm hosts one could imagine. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. The hotel is part of the Relais & Chateaux association which means that it is luxurious and most welcoming to the visitor. An excellent restaurant. It is a wonderful base for exploring Provence.

description: Surrounded by botanical gardens of five hectares, a Second Empire residence decorated with wrought iron, sculptured woodwork and brightly coloured materials… Only at 30 min from Avignon TGV and 1h30 from Marseille Airport, The Chateau de Montcaud is the perfect place to discover the region and enjoy the mediterranean way of life.
